summary: 2001 INTERNATIONAL CONVENTIONAL,  A COMMERCIAL TRIPLE COMBINATION, WAS EASTBOUND ON THE OHIO TURNPIKE IN THE RIGHT LANE.  THE LAST TWO TRAILERS DISCONNECT FROM THE POWER UNIT DAMAGING THE SECOND TRAILER.  THE TRAILERS CAME TO REST IN THE RIGHT LANE AND PARTIALLY ON THE BERM.     *BF  (OHIO TRAFFIC CRASH REPORT # 10-0125-90. *JB  UPDATED 03/29/11  *BF
